++ Food Recipe Banana Bread


+++ Notes

  * Batter can make loaf, or cupcake type pieces (better for breakfast)


+++ Tools

  * Bread pan or cupcake pans 

+++ Ingredients 
  
  * 1 cup vegan brown sugar

  * 1 1/2 cups mashed ripe bananas (3 medium) Save $
  
  * 1/2 cup refined coconut oil, melted
  
  * 1 teaspoon vanilla
  
  * 1/4 cup "milk"
  
  * 1 teaspoon apple cider vinegar
  
  * 2 cups all-purpose flour
  
  * 3/4 teaspoon baking soda
  
  * 1/2 teaspoon salt
  
  * 1/2 cup chopped walnuts, if desired 

+++ Directions

  * Heat oven to 350° F. Grease bottom only of 9 x 5 x 3-inch loaf pan.

  * In large bowl, beat sugar, bananas, coconut oil and vanilla until smooth. Stir in almond milk and vinegar. Add flour, baking soda and salt; stir just until moistened. Stir in walnuts. Pour into pan.
  
  * Bake 1 hour to 1 hour 10 minutes ( or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean and crack in top of loaf appears dry). 
  
  * Cool 10 minutes. Remove from pan. Cool completely, about 1 hour, before slicing. 
  
  * Store in refrigerator
